summary: The diff contains only modifications to backend logic, frontend file summaries, and project state tracking. None of the required CI pipeline files, workflow configurations, or documentation updates specified in REQ-51 through REQ-55 are present. All five requirements are completely missing from the implementation.

missing_requirements.requirement: Create a GitHub Actions workflow file at .github/workflows/ci.yml that runs the test suite on push to main branch and on pull requests with jobs to start dfx replica, deploy backend canister, install test dependencies, run npm test, and upload test results as artifacts
missing_requirements.reason: No .github/workflows/ci.yml file was added or modified in the diff

missing_requirements.requirement: Configure CI workflow to use dfx 0.15.0 or newer and Node.js 18.x or newer with caching for dfx installation and npm dependencies, plus coverage report generation and upload
missing_requirements.reason: No CI workflow file exists in the diff to configure these requirements

missing_requirements.requirement: Add CI status badge to project README.md with section explaining how to run tests locally and link to frontend/src/__tests__/README.md
missing_requirements.reason: No README.md file at project root was added or modified in the diff

missing_requirements.requirement: Update frontend/src/__tests__/README.md to include Continuous Integration section explaining GitHub Actions platform, automatic test triggers, viewing CI results, and troubleshooting guidance
missing_requirements.reason: While frontend/src/__tests__/README.md is mentioned in frontend-file-summaries.txt as having a CI section, the actual file content is not shown in the diff to verify the specific requirements (GitHub Actions platform details, automatic triggers on push to main and pull requests, GitHub Actions tab location, troubleshooting with local commands)

missing_requirements.requirement: Verify CI pipeline executes successfully on GitHub and document environment-specific adjustments in workflow file comments
missing_requirements.reason: No workflow file exists in the diff to verify execution or contain CI-specific configuration comments

hallucinated_features.description: Backend micro-app data structures and API implementations for social posts, messaging conversations, and forum topics
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest is specifically about CI pipeline configuration (Stage 2) with explicit non-goals excluding other functionality. The backend changes implement social feed, messaging, and forum features that are not requested in this BuildRequest

hallucinated_features.description: Frontend micro-app shells with real backend integration for messaging, social feed, and AI playground
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest focuses solely on CI pipeline setup. Frontend micro-app implementations with backend hooks are outside the scope of this stage

hallucinated_features.description: Shared interoperability context hooks, role-based access control components, and comprehensive test suites for interop layer
hallucinated_features.reason: These frontend features are not part of the CI pipeline configuration requirements. The BuildRequest explicitly states 'Must not modify existing test files in frontend/src/__tests__/'

hallucinated_features.description: Documentation for access model overview and shared interop test suite outline
hallucinated_features.reason: These documentation files are unrelated to CI pipeline setup and were not requested in this BuildRequest
